FSENotifications.Body: %Product%: The %ScanJob% has started successfully on %Company%/%Site%/%Server%.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% scan startup

FSENotifications.Body: Your %LicenseType% license of %Product% will expire in %NumDays% day(s). %EvalText%Please contact your sales representative to purchase %Product%. For more information, please refer to %HowToBuyLink%.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% License Warning Notification

FSENotifications.Body: Your %LicenseType% license of %Product% has expired. %SubscriptionText%Subsequently, scanner updates will be disabled and the product will operate with reduced functionality. Please contact your sales representative to purchase %Product%. For more information, please refer to %HowToBuyLink%.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% License Expiration Notification

FSENotifications.Body: The database used to store incidents and quarantine information for %Product% has grown larger than %MaximumSize% MB. (It is currently %CurrentSize% MB.) If you want to recover disk space from this database, you can change the configuration settings for automatic purging of incidents and quarantine, or you can delete items manually. For more information, please refer to your %Product% documentation.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% Database Size Warning

FSENotifications.Body: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% successfully updated the %Engine% scan engine on server %Server%

FSENotifications.Body: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% failed to update the %Engine% scan engine on server %Server%

FSENotifications.Body: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% found no new updates for the %Engine% scan engine on server %Server%

FSENotifications.Body: The %Engine% scan engine is no longer supported. Updates are no longer available for this engine, and therefore the update check for this engine has been disabled. Please review the scan engines chosen for your scan jobs and make another selection to ensure up-to-date protection. For more information, see the following knowledge base article: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% engine selection error

FSENotifications.Body: ERROR: %Product%: The Monitor detected abnormal shutdown of: %Process%.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: %Product%: The %ScanJob% did not start successfully.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: %Product%: The %ScanJob% recovered from a startup failure. You can ignore the previous warning.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: %Product%: The %ScanJob% has been started with its default settings. You may want to confirm that the settings in %Product% match what you expect.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body:
%Product% has timed out while scanning the following message.
%Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% timeout on %ScanJob% scan job

FSENotifications.Body:
%Product% has recovered from a timeout while scanning the following message.
%Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product% has recovered from a timeout on %ScanJob% scan job

FSENotifications.Body: WARNING: %Product%: The Information Store scanning subsystem on server %Server% may not be correctly initialized and is currently unable to perform scanning of the store.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: INFORMATION: %Product%: The Information Store scanning subsystem on server %Server% is online. You can ignore the previous warning.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: WARNING: %Product%: The SMTP scanning subsystem on server %Server% may not be correctly initialized and is currently unable to perform SMTP scans.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: INFORMATION: %Product%: The SMTP scanning subsystem on server %Server% is online. You can ignore the previous warning.
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body:
%Product%: The transport scan had a problem processing the following message. The message has been archived and purged.
Sender: "%FromAddress%" Recipients: "%Recipients%" Subject: "%Subject%"
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Critical Notification

FSENotifications.Body:
%Product%: The health monitoring service has detected a change in health status from %OldStatus% to %NewStatus%.
Functionality being checked: %HealthPoint% Old Status: %OldStatus% New Status: %NewStatus% Details: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Health Notification

FSENotifications.Body:
%Product%: The health monitoring service has detected a change in health status from %OldStatus% to %NewStatus%.
Functionality being checked: %HealthPoint% Old Status: %OldStatus% New Status: %NewStatus% Details: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Health Notification

FSENotifications.Body:
%Product%: The health monitoring service has detected a change in health status from %OldStatus% to %NewStatus%.
Functionality being checked: %HealthPoint% Old Status: %OldStatus% New Status: %NewStatus% Details: %Details%
FSENotifications.Subject: %Product%: Health Notification
